title.rendered: 2018 Award of Excellence in Leadership goes to Molly May

content.rendered:
ClinLab Staffing puts a lot of emphasis on celebrating the growth and leadership of our hard working employees. We were proud to award the 2018 Award of Excellence in Leadership to Massachusetts Account Manager, Molly May. Essential criteria to be an excellent leader include being role model, inspiring others, demonstrating initiative, and leading a team to achieve results.

Molly has been a member of the ClinLab Team since 2015. She began her career here as a scientific recruiter and now works as an account manager focusing on business development with both new and existing clients. Her behavior exemplifies that in which it takes to foster long lasting client relationships and ensuring that her team delivers top talent for every role. Her great quality of work has lead to a large quantity of solid business relationships.

Outside of the office Molly gets involved in different charities in the Greater Boston Area and provides opportunities for her coworkers to get involved alongside with her.

Thank you Molly for your Excellent Leadership skills, we are proud of your Achievements!
